title.rendered: Search Berg Ranked In Top 15 Local SEO Companies In New York

content.rendered:
After 10 years of hard work, the accolades and recognition is finally pouring in from all over the world. After winning the 2017 Customer Choice Award for Best SEO by Site Jabber, Search Berg is has now been ranked in the top 15 Local SEO Companies in New York.

Digital marketing is all the rage in the ever-changing face of online marketing today. With over 1 trillion searches made on Google in 2017 alone, its popularity has a massive influence on what people see about a brand. People want to win at SEO and the best way to go about it is to go with an Award winning SEO agency that specializes in Local SEO.

…But What IS Local SEO?
Local SEO is an instrument that enables you to promote the visibility of your business online through location-based searches.

It is simply a variation of standard SEO practices aimed specifically at ensuring that your business is found online by people making searches related to your industry in their particular localities. That means you have higher chances of turning a potential visitor to a confirmed customer/client.

These searches include certain geo qualifiers like city, state, etc. along with “near me” searches that Google provides based on the person’s location and then displays search results based on that area and information.

Why Is It Important?
Local SEO is crucial for maintaining an online presence for businesses that have brick-and-mortar stores or service providers for specific localities.

According to Forbes, 9 out of 10 mobile searches result in action—over half of which result in sales.

Moreover, 95% of smartphone users used their phones to search for local information.

How Can We Help?
Search Berg is ranked as one of the top local SEO Agencies in New York. We provide full-scale digital marketing services with a strong focus on SEO, PPC, web services and reputation management. With an experience of over 10 years in the digital marketing industry and over 15,000 projects completed, we are proud to be one of the leading agencies out there.

If you’re on the search for the top, professional, reliable and result-driven digital marketing agencies for local SEO services, call us at 8555-444-4777 to mark your local online presence.

Take a look at how Search Berg made the list, right here: https://upcity.com/local-marketing-agencies/lists/top-local-seo-agencies-in-new-york
